Rainy_Day_0: The pitter patter of rain always calms my jittered nerves...#$e#Haha, I heard that one in a song once. Hi, honey, how are you?$4
Rainy_Day_1: A nice rainy day always reminds me of something warm and relaxing, so I made some tea. You want some?[614]$4
Rainy_Day_2: I'm so lucky I found you. I love you, hun.$8
Rainy_Day_3: Be careful outside! Don't slip, please.
Rainy_Day_4: I wish I could spend every moment of the day with you...$8#$b#But it's okay, I know you have to take care of things. Stay safe, @.
Rainy_Day_5: I'm going to exercise a bit inside today, I hope you don't mind.#$e#I'll either do that, or cuddle up under some blankets!
Rainy_Night_0: I'm so glad you're home, babe.#$b#%*kiss*#$b#Now let's relax and have a great night in!
Rainy_Night_1: Here, cutie, eat this while you dry off.[606]$1#$b#I hope that warms you right up!
Rainy_Night_2: Don't you have a jacket? I don't want you to get sick out there.$2
Rainy_Night_3: *yawn*, it's been a low key day.#$b#I'm going to head to bed soon, you're welcome to join whenever!$1
Rainy_Night_4: So, are rainy days for you easier than sunny days? You don't really have to plant anything, right?$1#$e#That means you can have more energy for later!$7
Rainy_Night_5: What do you want for dinner tomorrow, dear?#$b#...#$b#Okay, I'll try my best!$1
Indoor_Day_0: I wish you could stay with me forever...$2#$b#But I guess you are the true breadwinner here.#$b#Love you, babe!$8
Indoor_Day_1: It's crazy how every time I talk to you, I still get the butterflies in my stomach.$4#$e#Do you feel them too?$8
Indoor_Day_2: Good morning, my sweetest @!!$1#$b#Here, I made you breakfast. [210 211]$1
Indoor_Day_3: It's great living in Stardew Valley. It's like all my dreams have come true...$4
Indoor_Day_4: Good morning, sweetie!$8#$b#It's hard to believe you kept talking to me after that one time in the forest!$4#$b#I was so awkward because you're so cute and I couldn't believe you were talking to me...$8
Indoor_Day_5: Recieved a call from one of my roommates the other day, they said I owed them some money...$2#$b#...$2#$b#Bahaha, just joking! You should've seen the look on your face!$7
Indoor_Night_0: I'm so happy. Every time I look at the pendant you gave me, I have to pinch myself to remind myself that I'm not dreaming.$4
Indoor_Night_1: Good evening, @! I made you a vegan burger! [241]$1#$e#If you want things with meat in them, you can make them, but just make sure to wash the dishes thoroughly in the sink after, okay?$8
Indoor_Night_2: I'm sleepy tonight! I'm ready for bed whenever you are.$1
Indoor_Night_3: I can't believe how much Stardew Valley changed our lives. We both went from a miserable life in ZuZu City to a happy life here.$1#$b#I love you.$8
Indoor_Night_4: Do these leggings look good on me? I worry I don't look the best for you, hon.$4
Indoor_Night_5: One of these days, we should spin some of my old records and dance around.#$b#Waltz across the carpet like 1-2-3, 2-2-3, right?$4
Outdoor_0: I wish I had your muscles, @!$4#$b#I'm afraid I wouldn't be too much help, my arms are like spaghetti noodles.#$e#I'll cheer you on from here, though!$1
Outdoor_1: What a beautiful landscape... it's incredible that your granddad just gave this to you...$4
Outdoor_2: Man, I went from a crowded bedroom in a shared apartment with 4 other people who didn't care about me, to this.#$b#I'm so thankful for every day that I can look into your eyes, @.$8
Outdoor_3: I hope it's okay if I still have a bad day every now and then, @.#$b#...#$b#You're so understanding... I love that.$4
Outdoor_4: The fresh air in this area is second to none. It's so beautiful here...$8
Outdoor_5: I'll spend some time out here and study how you farm. Maybe I'll learn how to do it one of these days!$1
OneKid_0: I can't believe we're parents!$1#$b#%kid1 is so lucky to have you as a dad.$8^%kid1 is so lucky to have us both as moms.$8
OneKid_1: I am totally going to rock this motherhood thing!$1
OneKid_2: I wish my dad was able to meet %kid1, but I'm sure he's smiling down on all of us right now, right?$4
OneKid_3: Sometimes it's so tiring feeding %kid1, but then I remember how happy I am...$4#$e#Still though, I should get some more sleep soon!$7
TwoKid_0: What beautiful names, %kid1 and %kid2. We have good taste, @. Don't you think so, too?
TwoKid_1: We're parents, @... to two beautiful children...#$b#If I'm dreaming, I hope I never wake up, because this is the perfect life for me...$4#$b#...!$6#$b#You don't have to pinch me, you jokester! I know I'm not dreaming!$7
TwoKid_2: I played one of my vinyls for the kids, and I think they really liked it!$1#$b#Especially %kid2! But they were both dancing their butts off!$4
TwoKid_3: Do you think that our kids will grow up to be farmers like you are?#$b#I hope they don't move to ZuZu City, that place is soul draining...$2
Good_0: I hid a note under your pillow earlier... can you guess what it says?$4#$e#How'd you know it was "I love you!"?$7
Good_1: You know, I kind of like it here.$4#$b#I think I'm gonna stay.$7#$b#...of course I'm joking, I love it here, I love you especially!$8
Good_2: I always kind of had a feeling that we'd end up in love...$4#$b#I'm happy it was sooner rather than later!$8
Good_3: Hey, @!$1#$b#%*smooch*#$b#I love you so so so so so so so so much!$8
Good_4: Even on my worst days, you're still here to comfort me. Thank you. So much.$8
Good_5: Sometimes, I wish we could spend all day just cuddling, but it's okay. You have things to do.#$b#Be careful out there, hun.$1
Good_6: I got a letter from my old roommate apologizing for some of her actions.#$b#I thought it was nice, but I forgot about all those troubles I had there when I moved in with you here.$8
Good_7: You know, back in high school, when I went to prom, I went with this girl from my class, and I had a horrible time.#$b#I kind of swore off lovey-dovey stuff since then, but then you came along.$4#$b#You changed everything, @. And I love you for it.$8
Good_8: Am I too intense of a lover?$2#$b#I'm still insecure about some things, I know I shouldn't be...#$b#But sometimes I just worry I'm not perfect enough for you like you are for me.$4
Neutral_0: Do you think I'll be beautiful still once my hair turns grey?#$b#I don't know if I can keep this undercut going forever either...
Neutral_2: I'll be honest, the creaky floorboards were annoying at first, but now, they're endearing.
Neutral_3: I need to do laundry tonight! You don't need to help, but I'd appreciate some.
Neutral_4: I am suh-LEEPY today. I might call an early night tonight, hun.
Neutral_5: Do you remember watching those teen movies back in the day?#$b#I used to be such a teenage dirtbag...
Neutral_6: How are we doing on funds, @?
Neutral_7: Should I actually make an attempt at making friends with people in town?#$b#I think it'd be worth it.
Neutral_8: What kind of flowers are you growing, @?
Neutral_9: My ankle's bothering me a bit today. I hope that's not anything bad.$2
Bad_2: I wish you'd talk to me more...$2#$b#Instead I sort of feel like chopped liver, just standing here and watching you leave...$2
Bad_4: I don't know if I can move back to ZuZu City...$2
Bad_5: Did you finally realize how ugly I am?$2
Bad_6: Why can't I cry about this...?$2#$b#Is there something you know that I don't?$2
Bad_7: If you don't want to be with me, just say and I'll go...$2
Bad_9: I miss the old days, when you still loved me.$2#$b#Now it seems like there's something between us, and I can't pull you back towards me...$2
patio_Delores: Just getting a little bit of exercise in, hope you don't mind!$7
Rainy_Day_Delores: If you go fishing today, please stay warm. I don't want you catching something fierce.$2
Rainy_Night_Delores: Oh dear, you're soaked to the bone!#$b#Let's get those clothes off of you!#$b#...$8#$b#Oh, you perv!$4
Indoor_Day_Delores: I used to be one of those who had to have sunlight, but...#$b#I think I like every minute of the day now.$1
Indoor_Night_Delores: Time to kick your feet up and relax after a long day of work, huh @?$1
Outdoor_Delores: This farm, man. It's built out of the same things that dreams are made of.$1
funLeave_Delores: I think I'm going to go exercise a bit today. Maybe I'll stop in at the saloon too.#$b#I'll be back by sunset, love you babe.$8
funReturn_Delores: Man, the walk back is exercise enough for me!$7#$b#I had a really fun day, though. Did you have a good day?$8
stardrop_gift: I can't believe how perfect you are for me. Here's something special for you, my love.$4
spring_1: Happy New Year, my dear!$1#$b#%*smooch*#$b#Now go out there and plant new seeds! Love you.$8
spring_12: I'll take care of the house while you go to the Egg Festival tomorrow. Hope everything goes well, sweetie!$1
spring_23: Sorry dear, I don't think I can go to the Flower Dance, my ankles are KILLING me today. Say hi to Leah for me please!$1
spring_28: Tomorrow, it's gonna be summertime, how hard to believe!#$b#Time flies when I'm with you, babe.$8
summer_1: What are we planting this season, hun?
summer_10: Say hi to the Governor tomorrow for me, please! I'm not one for luaus, haha, so you can have fun with your friends from town.$1
summer_28: I'd love to go to see the moonlight jellies with you tomorrow, but I don't want to walk on that beach again with my ankle as it is.#$b#I'm sorry hun, I really am.$2
fall_1: That leafy smell must mean that fall is here! I'll try my best to be happy this season. Not just for you, but for me, too.$1
fall_14: Another year passes since I've lost my father. He was a good man, @. He really was.#$e#Thank you for helping me through today, @.
fall_15: Here's a meal I made for you to display in your grange tomorrow! [609]$1#$e#I hope we win! You'll have to tell me how it goes when you get home tomorrow.$8
fall_26: Do you think I'd look good with glasses? Or would I look too much like a hipster chick?
winter_15: Hm, can you guess what today is?$4#$e#Ah, you guessed right! Love you, hun.$8
winter_24: I found a beautiful gem, so I thought you might like it. [60 62 64 66 68 70 72]$8#$b#If you got me as the person you're giving a gift to tomorrow, just give it to me now, since I need to stay home and do some housekeeping.
winter_28: What a year for us, don't you agree? I love you, @.$8
spouseRoom_Delores: Don't mind me! I'm just going to rock out to something in here, if you don't mind.#$e#Music always gets my exercise nerve going.$1#$e#...is that even a saying?$4
